mapper.select: select id , server_id , min_latency , ave_latency , max_latency , received , sent , outstanding , zxid , mode , node_count , total_watches , client_number , time_stamp from mario_server_state where id = #{id}

select id , server_id , min_latency , ave_latency , max_latency , received , sent , outstanding , zxid , mode , node_count , total_watches , client_number , time_stamp from mario_server_state order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into mario_server_state ( id , server_id , min_latency , ave_latency , max_latency , received , sent , outstanding , zxid , mode , node_count , total_watches , client_number , time_stamp ) values ( #{id} , #{server_id} , #{min_latency} , #{ave_latency} , #{max_latency} , #{received} , #{sent} , #{outstanding} , #{zxid} , #{mode} , #{node_count} , #{total_watches} , #{client_number} , #{time_stamp} )
mapper.update: update mario_server_state set id = #{id} , server_id = #{server_id} , min_latency = #{min_latency} , ave_latency = #{ave_latency} , max_latency = #{max_latency} , received = #{received} , sent = #{sent} , outstanding = #{outstanding} , zxid = #{zxid} , mode = #{mode} , node_count = #{node_count} , total_watches = #{total_watches} , client_number = #{client_number} , time_stamp = #{time_stamp} where id = #{id}
